column1: '''The VikingMUD''' is a mud<ref name="El Anillo"/> made by [[Pål-Kristian Engstad]], after an original of Hansen's [[Ringen]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> It takes place in [[Moria]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
